item.description: An AI 'Godfather' Is Raising a Red Flag Over AI Agents  Business Insider

item.title: Apple Intelligence: iPhone AI news alerts halted after errors - BBC.com
item.description:
1. Apple Intelligence: iPhone AI news alerts halted after errors  BBC.com
  2. Apple is pulling its AI-generated notifications for news after generating fake headlines  CNN
  3. iOS 18.3 automatically enables Apple Intelligence for users, requires opt-out to disable  9to5Mac
  4. Apple Made a Major Change to Apple Intelligence that Some People Aren’t Going to Like  Inc.
  5. The Latest iPhone Update Includes 1 Feature You Might Want To Turn Off ASAP  HuffPost
